body.label: Verso
body.value:
III:

  1. Record of sums spent by al-Shaykh Abūʾl-Surūr
  2. as he found it necessary:
  3. To Wafā, 1 dinar. To Yehūdā and Ghālib, 8.
  4. Lime, including transportation, 2. Slaking of lime and depositing of wood, 20.
  5. Workers in clay, 11. Slaking of lime, ½.
  6. 3 ḥimls of pebbles, 4½. Ghālib, 3.
  7. Gypsum and other things, 21½. A helper, 3½.
  8. Their meal, 1. Slaking of lime, ½.
  9. A worker in lime, 4. A helper, 3½.
  10. Their meal, 1. Oakum, 3½.
  11. Total, in gold, 1 dinar.
  12. (In waraq) 86½.
  13. Plus,
  14. the edge of the grating, 1¼. Blocking up of the door, 3.
  15. A carpenter, 4. 1½ raṭl nails, 4.
  16. His meal, ½. (Total,) 12¾.
  17. Transportation of wood and its unloading, 14½.
  18. Total, 15.
